description: VERSATILE: Conveniently transforms into 10 different types of screwdrivers using the included bits (Phillips Head (2) #1 and (2) #2, Slotted 1/4 in. and 3/16 in., Star T15 and T20, and Squarehead SQ1 and SQ2)
Includes industrial strength heat treated bits: 3/8-Inch, 5/16-Inch and 1/4-Inch nut drivers, #1 and #2 Phillips, 1/4-Inch and 3/16-Inch slotted, T10 and T15 TORX, and #1 and #2 square recess
Slotted screwdriver sizes available in 3/16inch x 3inch, 1/4inch x 4inch, and 5/16inch x 6inch
Includes 2-pc. slotted mini screwdrivers: 3/16, 1/4 in.; 2-pc. Phillips mini screwdrivers: #1, #2

Magnetic tip for more convenient control, whether pulling out screws or lining them up with a hole; tweezer includes a plated resistive electrostatic discharge (ESD) coating to keep electronic devices safe from damaging static
